title: In Israel, Sperm Of Soldiers Killed In Gaza War Being Frozen
content: As Israel's war in Gaza rages, a growing number of parents in Israel are demanding sperm from the bodies of their sons, who were killed during the ongoing conflict, to be extracted and frozen, a BBC report said.
summary: As Israel's war in Gaza rages, a growing number of parents in Israel are demanding sperm from the bodies of their sons, who were killed during the ongoing conflict, to be extracted and frozen, a BBC report said.

title: 'Cat Ladies' Unite Against JD Vance's Sexist Remark For Kamala Harris
content: The virtual gathering of prominent Democrats, hosted by Christine Pelosi and Nikki Fried, was held on Tuesday evening to denounce Vance's sexist remarks.
summary: The virtual gathering of prominent Democrats, hosted by Christine Pelosi and Nikki Fried, was held on Tuesday evening to denounce Vance's sexist remarks.

title: In Pics: How NASA Prepared Astronauts For Future Mission To Mars
content: Sealed inside a habitat in Texas and cut off from the outside world for over a year, Kelly Haston was the commander of a first-of-its-kind simulation for NASA to prepare for a future mission to Mars.
summary: Sealed inside a habitat in Texas and cut off from the outside world for over a year, Kelly Haston was the commander of a first-of-its-kind simulation for NASA to prepare for a future mission to Mars.

title: How Harris Replacing Biden Has Forced Trump To Change His Poll Strategy
content: The Republican's race for the White House was thrown into chaos on July 21 when US President Joe Biden withdrew his candidacy, backing Vice President Harris as the Democratic nominee.
summary: The Republican's race for the White House was thrown into chaos on July 21 when US President Joe Biden withdrew his candidacy, backing Vice President Harris as the Democratic nominee.

title: Opinion: India Is Turning Up The Heat On China - And Not Just In Its Neighbourhood
content: The message is very clear - that New Delhi will not relent in pressing ahead with its pushback against Beijing even as the door is open for China to recalibrate its anti-India positioning.
summary: The message is very clear - that New Delhi will not relent in pressing ahead with its pushback against Beijing even as the door is open for China to recalibrate its anti-India positioning.

title: Israel Used Dogs, Waterboarding On Palestinian Detainees: UN Flags "Torture"
content: Since October 7, thousands of Palestinians -- including medics, patients, residents and captured fighters -- have been taken from Gaza to Israel.
summary: Since October 7, thousands of Palestinians -- including medics, patients, residents and captured fighters -- have been taken from Gaza to Israel.

title: Jacques Lewis, One Of Last Surviving Veterans Of Normandy Landings, Dies
content: One of the last surviving French veterans of the June 1944 D-Day landings has died aged 105, only weeks after he helped welcome US President Joe Biden to Paris for the 80th anniversary of the amphibious assault, the presidency said Tuesday.
summary: One of the last surviving French veterans of the June 1944 D-Day landings has died aged 105, only weeks after he helped welcome US President Joe Biden to Paris for the 80th anniversary of the amphibious assault, the presidency said Tuesday.

title: India Is Not Responsible For Climate Crisis, But...: Commonwealth Head
content: India is not historically responsible for the climate crisis but it should not emulate polluting practices of the West from the 19th century during its development, Commonwealth Secretary General Patricia Scotland has said.
summary: India is not historically responsible for the climate crisis but it should not emulate polluting practices of the West from the 19th century during its development, Commonwealth Secretary General Patricia Scotland has said.

title: In Over 2 Years Of War, Russia And Ukraine Are Also Fighting Fake News
content: Disinformation and propaganda, long mainstays of war, have been digitally supercharged in the battle for Ukraine, the biggest conflict the world has seen since the advent of smartphones and social media.
summary: Disinformation and propaganda, long mainstays of war, have been digitally supercharged in the battle for Ukraine, the biggest conflict the world has seen since the advent of smartphones and social media.

title: At TikTok's Parent Company, 57 Hospitalised After Mass Food Poisoning
content: A mass food poisoning incident led 60 people to fall sick with symptoms of gastroenteritis at the Singapore office of TikTok's parent company, ByteDance on Tuesday. At least 57 of them had to be hospitalized after the incident.
summary: A mass food poisoning incident led 60 people to fall sick with symptoms of gastroenteritis at the Singapore office of TikTok's parent company, ByteDance on Tuesday. At least 57 of them had to be hospitalized after the incident.

title: "Not Celebrating Anymore": Video Shows Hamas Chief React To Oct 7 Attack
content: Hours after an Israeli strike in Tehran killed Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh, a video purportedly showing him celebrating the October 7 assault by Hamas on Israel has surface online.
summary: Hours after an Israeli strike in Tehran killed Hamas chief Ismail Haniyeh, a video purportedly showing him celebrating the October 7 assault by Hamas on Israel has surface online.

title: "Unacceptable Political Murder": Russia After Hamas Chief Killed In Strike
content: "This is an absolutely unacceptable political murder, and it will lead to further escalation of tensions," RIA cited Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Bogdanov as saying.
summary: "This is an absolutely unacceptable political murder, and it will lead to further escalation of tensions," RIA cited Deputy Foreign Minister Mikhail Bogdanov as saying.

title: Australia Launches Life-Saving Peanut Allergy Treatment For Babies
content: Eligible babies will receive daily doses of peanut powder for two years to build up their tolerance, said officials announcing the initiative on Wednesday. Over time, the infants will be given increasing doses to reduce their peanut sensitivity.
summary: Eligible babies will receive daily doses of peanut powder for two years to build up their tolerance, said officials announcing the initiative on Wednesday. Over time, the infants will be given increasing doses to reduce their peanut sensitivity.

title: Thousands Protest In Venezuela Opposing Nicolas Maduro's Disputed Poll Win
content: Many in the crowd wore white -- the favorite color of opposition leader Maria Corina Machado -- or national football team shirts and caps. A sea of yellow, blue and red Venezuelan flags also filled the avenue, some worn as capes.
summary: Many in the crowd wore white -- the favorite color of opposition leader Maria Corina Machado -- or national football team shirts and caps. A sea of yellow, blue and red Venezuelan flags also filled the avenue, some worn as capes.

title: France Is Using AI Surveillance Systems To Secure Paris Olympics
content: The AI system does not collect biometric data, but instead recognises individuals in crowds using unique identification. The algorithm captures and processes the unique physiology of persons and identifies behavior that is suspicious.
summary: The AI system does not collect biometric data, but instead recognises individuals in crowds using unique identification. The algorithm captures and processes the unique physiology of persons and identifies behavior that is suspicious.

title: Woman Comes Home To Strangers In Pool After Tenant Rents It Out For $35
content: The family paid $35 (approximately Rs 2,200) to use the pool, but the homeowner was not the one who posted the listing.
summary: The family paid $35 (approximately Rs 2,200) to use the pool, but the homeowner was not the one who posted the listing.

title: Lavish Blue Lobster, Wine Feast For King Charles Cost France Rs 4 Crore
content: An extravagant feast for King Charles has cost the French government a whopping $500,000 million (Rs 4 crore), an audit report has found.
summary: An extravagant feast for King Charles has cost the French government a whopping $500,000 million (Rs 4 crore), an audit report has found.

title: "Ismail Haniyeh's Assassination Will Not Go Unanswered": Hamas
content: A senior Hamas official said Wednesday that the killing of the Palestinian movement's chief Ismail Haniyeh "will not go unanswered".
summary: A senior Hamas official said Wednesday that the killing of the Palestinian movement's chief Ismail Haniyeh "will not go unanswered".

title: How Ismail Haniyeh Rose From Being Activist To Chief Of Hamas
content: Ismail Haniyeh, the Hamas leader who was killed in Iran, was the tough-talking face of the Palestinian group's international diplomacy as war raged back in Gaza, where three of his sons were killed in an Israeli airstrike.
summary: Ismail Haniyeh, the Hamas leader who was killed in Iran, was the tough-talking face of the Palestinian group's international diplomacy as war raged back in Gaza, where three of his sons were killed in an Israeli airstrike.

title: World Just Saw Its Hottest Day Ever, Here's How It Was Analysed
